channel.title: Make up your own Personality Cores!
channel.description:
The cores in the first game were fun, even if they were pretty two dimensional. In the second, that's not the case. There, the personality cores had [i]personality[/i]. Everybody has a favourite, as far as I know.
But I was thinking that maybe three (or four, counting Wheatley) isn't enough. And I haven't seen something like this anywhere else, so: Make up your own personality cores. Make sure you describe their eye, behavior, maybe even give them a few quotes?
For instance: Gordon Core :freeman: Lime-Green eye, like the Space and Fact cores'. Has a built-in lense with a relatively thick, black frame covering it. Looks calmly at you, blinks regularly. Quote: "..." Adventure Core's reaction: "Not much of a talker, huh? Well, it's better than the other two"

item.source: Make up your own Personality Cores!

item.title: Make up your own Personality Cores!
item.dc:creator: Theevilpplz
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Stream-Of-Consciousness-Narrative-Core, as voiced by James McCaffrey-

"The din of the scraping noise that was my forcible extrication from the frame of GlaDOS echoed in the chamber like sound in a wind-tunnel, making me ever more aware of my impending doom at the hands of a woman I knew next to nothing about. She was lean, muscular, attractive in that crazy way that only strong women could pull off well. The years of testing by GlaDOS strangely didn’t manage to stop her getting a line-less tan. I tried to remember if I’d had tanning beds installed before the rest of the malevolent trans-human wet-ware AI had flooded the facility with neurotoxin. Regardless, she regarded me with eyes of malice, somehow managing to scare me despite being a part of GlaDOS for most of my waking life. Curious how the machine only feels alive in the face of destruction. Did I have a purpose? A soul? Did I have any choices?
[player chucks into incinerator]
As the smoke and the heat engulfed me, one final thought passed through my mind-
[door closes]

That… was amazing wipes tear from eye

Read full topic
item.source: Make up your own Personality Cores!

item.title: Make up your own Personality Cores!
item.dc:creator: Scorpion42
item.description:
SassyRobot:

This is where you lost me. I wouldn’t mind a thread where people draw their own or whatever but just attaching a characters name to one seems a bit pointless.

I just needed an example. And the Adventure Core is named Rick anyway. I guess Gordon would be a silent protagonist core or something.

Read full topic
